title: 13" Retina Batteries - 2013-2014 work with 2015 and vice-versa?
message: I'm struggling to figure out why 2013-2014 13" Retina batteries are not being sold as compatible with 2015 models and the other way around. Any ideas?

title: 13" Retina Batteries - 2013-2014 work with 2015 and vice-versa?
message: Maybe because they are not compatible????

title: 13" Retina Batteries - 2013-2014 work with 2015 and vice-versa?
message: Ok, got it, thanks, but why not? What specifically doesn't work? Have you tried it?
